raw_body: DE SILVA – GUSTINNAWADUGE GUNANADA SOMASIRI DE SILVA,​ Attorney-at-Law. Husband of Geetha,​ father of Rajeev and Kishani,​ father-in-law of Sonal Kumar and Chithalka Navaratne,​ grandfather of Thisaly,​ Rehan,​ Yevan and Anika,​ brother of Janaki,​ late Sriyani,​ late Bhupendranath,​ Dasarath and G.Y. De Silva,​ brother-in-law of late N.R.M. Daluwatte,​ late S.K. Gunatilake,​ Sepalika,​ Mallika Rodrigo De Silva and Kumari,​ passed away peacefully in Melbourne,​ Australia. Service and cremation at 10 a.m. on April 18,​ 2024 at Springvale Botanical Cemetery.          025355
